original_text: But as for the girls who have not had sex with a man, you may keep them for yourselves.’
korean_text: 남자와 동침하지 아니하여 사내를 알지 못하는 여자들은 다 너희를 위하여 살려둘 것이니라

sentences.original_text: who have not had sex with a man
you may keep them for yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들을 위해 그들을 남겨둘 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: you may keep them for yourselves.'
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들을 위해 그들을 남겨둘 수 있습니다.'
